public DropDown()

Method Detail

addItem

public DropDown addItem(java.lang.String item)
Adds a dropdown item

getItem

public java.lang.String getItem(int index)
Returns DropDown item at given index. Returns null if index is bigger than size of the DropDown or lesser than 0.

getItemCount

public int getItemCount()
Returns number of items in the DropDown

getSelection

public int getSelection()
Returns index of currently selected tiem. If there is no selected item, return -1.

getValue

public java.lang.String getValue()
Reruns string value of current selection
Overrides:
getValue in class AbstractInput

removeItem

public java.lang.String removeItem(java.lang.String item)
Removes a dropdown item

setSelection

public void setSelection(int index)
Marks item identified by the given index as selected.

setSelection

public int setSelection(java.lang.String item)
Marks item identified by the given item value as selected.
Returns:
index of selected item or -1 if item of this value can not be found

setValues

public void setValues(java.lang.String[] values)
Provides processing of client input. For DropDown this is a string representation of index of selected item.
